column1: Make sure to copy this document to your own drive
2. Enter your predictions for the first round in the "Your Predictions" column.
3. This will automatically seed the first round of the knockout stage. You have to type in your winners from this point to the championship.

5. Email the downloaded file to gaurav@shopify.com
